Rafael,
This question has been going through my mind ever since I read on this site about how the Cowboys version of the 3-4 is in essence very similar to a 4-3 Under (believe it or not this idea hadÂ occurredÂ to me). This was due to Ware almost Always rushing, whilst Spencer will mainly play pass/run defence (Ware's assignment is pre defined whilst Spencer's is defined by the O). We line up 3-4 but change at the snap to essentially a 4-3. My question is this. Does this happen by design or because of the relative talents of Ware and Spencer? Spencer takes a lot of Heat for not being Ware, but is most of it justified?Â
